author: eptwts
text:
one of the reasons that the "your network is your net worth" saying is true, is because you're exposed to your networks problems...

if your network is wealthy & they explain their problems to you - you'll be exposed to "rich ppl problems"

if you can help them solve said problems, you can productize the solution & make bank

the reason most indie hackers on this app make products that they sell to other indie hackers, is because their network consists of other indie hackers, therefore they only run into indie hacker problems

the key is to expose yourself to a plethora of high net-worth problems & to obsess over finding solutions
